help.title: Google quick-search
help.text: Perform a quick google search without ever leaving the comfort of your discord

help.title: Google Translation help
help.text: Translate a specified number of users last messages into specified language.

queries.SET_SETTINGS: INSERT INTO `channel` (`channelID`, `channelName`, `serverID`, `serverName`, `region`, `memberCount`, `spreadsheet`, `webhook`, `modrole`, `language`) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `channelName`=IF(VALUES(`channelName`) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(`channelName`), `channelName`), `serverID`=IF(VALUES(`serverID`) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(`serverID`), `serverID`), `serverName`=IF(VALUES(`serverName`) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(`serverName`), `serverName`), `region`=IF(VALUES(`region`) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(`region`), `region`), `memberCount`=IF(VALUES(`memberCount`) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(`memberCount`), `memberCount`), `spreadsheet`=IF(VALUES(`spreadsheet`) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(`spreadsheet`), `spreadsheet`), `webhook`=IF(VALUES(`webhook`) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(`webhook`), `webhook`), `modrole`=IF(VALUES(`modrole`) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(`modrole`), IF(`modrole` IS NOT NULL, `modrole`, 'botmods')), `language`=IF(VALUES(`language`) IS NOT NULL, VALUES(`language`), IF(`language` IS NULL, 'ENG_US', `language`));
